title: Painting, ca. 1890
creditline: Gift of Mary N. Ettie and Elizabeth P. Weber in memory of George M. Nieder, United States Marine
description: Vertical rectangle.  Female court attendant is shown in pink goun, heavily embroidered blue and green top-dress

tombstone.epitaph:
Painting, ca. 1890.
ca. 1890. Gouache on rice pater. Gift of Mary N. Ettie and Elizabeth P. Weber in memory of George M. Nieder, United States Marine. 1966-36-1.
